about_the_game:
Is an action adventure collectathon that allows you to level up your character, unlock new abilities, take on gigantic mythical Boss', solve puzzles spanning over 6 unique environments, and uncover the truth about who you are. Every choice matters and every action shapes your characters appearance and skills.



Every action you take will shape who you are! An infamy system allows the look of the character to change based on the choices that you make!
The Infamy system also drives the skill system in Rawshire. As you collect items and progress through the game, your player will gain experience, level up and unlock new abilities to help you overcome new challenges.



Scattered throughout Rawshire are the dragon treasures of old. Collect the precious metals (bronze, silver, and gold) to rebuild those stores of wealth!



There are six unique environments to traverse through with multiple levels in each. Solve puzzles and fight enemies to uncover the secrets of Rawshire. Use the portals in Rawshire to replay levels or find lost souls.



Defeat the Guardians and earn your way to the top of the Mountain. Five evil Guardians have a hold on Rawshire. Use your skills and abilities to fight your way through and avenge Rawshire.

OVERVIEW

Rawshire the Last Hatchling offers a casual adventure experience. With an interactive world and many choices throughout, Rawshire offers unique experiences every playthrough! Play your way every time! With multiple endings it is an adventure worth taking twice!



Proudly developed and produced by Perpetual Reality Studios Inc. (A solo developer)

name: Rawshire The Last Hatchling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700k | AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one

short_description: An action adventure collectathon where an evil dragon destroys the last dragon sanctuary within Rawshire. Its up to you to save Rawshire. Level up, unlock new abilities, take on mythical bosses, solve unique puzzles and uncover the truth about who you are. Every choice matters. An adventure awaits!
